summary.value: A Silent strike, a fatal blow, an assassin's work is never slow.

system.description:
ALSO: Secret Agent, Shinobi

  • How are your targets chosen? Do you pick them yourself, or does somebody else do it?

  • Are you a freelancer, or part of an organization? Do you still work for them?

  • One of your previous marks changed you. How, and what happened?

  • Are you currently on a mission? Do you feel apprehensive about it for some reason?

ASSASSIN FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Inventory Points by 2.

PREDATOR SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.XutTT5ibA0IWX2kl]{Assassinate} (SL5)

You may spend an action and up to【SL x 5】MP (minimum 5 MP) to perform a free attack using a Brawling, Dagger, or Thrown weapon against a single creature, gaining a +1 to its Accuracy Check for every 5 MP spent this way. This attack cannot gain multi, and loses if it has it.

If you beat your target’s Defense by 5 or more, trigger an Assassination: Your attack ignores Affinities and multiplies its damage by x2, or to x3 if your target was Vulnerable to it in the first place.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.9u8jqkiI27YicLMQ]{Hide In Plain Sight} (SL3)

You may spend an action to perform an open check【DEX + INS】. Until the end of your next turn, you cannot be seen or targetted by any creature whose【INS】die is lower than the result of your check. You may exempt allies from this effect.

All contested or open checks closely related to hiding or sneaking (including this one) get a【+SL】bonus.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.LwLkkw4xZcv8ML2V]{Sneak Attack}

During your first turn of a conflict; or when one of your actions includes among its targets at least one creature that cannot see you, gain a【+SL】bonus to your Accuracy and Magic Checks.

Additionally, gain a【+SL】bonus to Initiative checks.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Bm5kX0HJR6mL6SEf]{Master Of Disguise}

If you have some time to prepare and are out of sight, you may spend 1 Fabula Point to fully adopt a new persona. Write it down: You may change into that persona at any time as long as you’re out of sight of those you wish to trick.

Your disguise is practically perfect and can withstand the scrutiny of any Soldier-ranked foe until you blow your cover.

Elites, Champions, and Villains may be able to see through your disguise, but only Villains get to permanently invalidate it by spending an Ultima Point.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.oNBIVnORM0mB9R3m]{Poissonnier} (SL3)

As an action, you may spend 2 Inventory Points and choose any number of weapons you are holding: Until the end of the scene, you increase their damage by 【SL】 and switch their damage to Poison.

All Open Checks related to identifying, combating, and using poisons gain a 【+SL】 bonus.

HEROIC SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.QBfG2V41hmsjeEgY]{Dual-Bladed Assassination}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.Xb84whBJgufzR9Id]{Deadly Rush}
